name: Onclick to Top
author: Md Akash Ahmed

sections.description:
Onclick to Top allow users return to the top of any page or post, eliminating the need for tedious scrolling. Customize the button’s appearance to match your website’s design is also applicable.

ðŸ”¥FREE FEATURES:

  • Displays a button when user scrolls down the page.
  • Button Size Customization
  • Icon Color Change option
  • Button Background Color Change option
  • Button Border Style option
  • Button Border Size option
  • Button Border Radius option
  • Button Positioning, Left or Right
  • Smooth Scroll Speed select option
  • Progress bar color option
  • Hide on mobile, tablet & desktop devices.

ðŸ“š How to use

You can use this plugin with some steps, like:

  • Search and Install the HR Scroll Top Plugin. You will be redirected to the plugin admin page after installing it.

  • You can change everything from here like change Icon, Change Background Color & Icon Color, Change Scroll Speed, Change the icon Round & Corner and can change the icon Position on your website.

*Then you go to your website and you will find an awesome Scroll To Top Icon with all functionality.
sections.faq:
01. Does Onclick to top works with all WordPress themes?

Yes.
